data.name: EBay - Bayofblack
data.description:
A Dark style created for eBay.

Please return to this page for updates.
data.css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("motors.ebay.com"), domain("ebaydesc.com"), domain("befr.ebay.be"), domain("ebay.com.au"), domain("ebay.com.hk"), domain("ebay.com.sg"), domain("ebay.co.uk"), domain("ebay.co.jp"), domain("ebay.com"), domain("ebay.at"), domain("ebay.ca"), domain("ebay.de"), domain("ebay.fr"), domain("ebay.nl"), domain("ebay.ie"), domain("ebay.in"), domain("ebay.it"), domain("ebay.ph"), domain("ebay.pl") {
/*text&background*/

ul, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, p, form, footer,

.oly-b, .oly-f, .oly-h, .oly, 
select, .row-header-inner,

    border: 1px #000000 solid !important;
  }

    border: 1px #000000 solid !important;

data.name: LWP By OCHOA
data.description: Dark mode para La Web del Programador

data.name: 洛谷题目打印机 By jwj
data.description: 介绍： 您可以使用它来屏蔽一些妨碍打印题目或者与题目无关的网页元素，从而比较完美地打印洛谷题目，或者把洛谷题目导出为PDF格式。 作者是一条酸菜鱼，如果在打印机里面发现了虫子或者有更好的修改建议可以联系作者修复，如果有不懂的地方也可以联系作者询问。祝您使用愉快！ 打印机使用说明书 适用于：谷歌浏览器 反馈： - 邮箱：jwjawa@qq.com - QQ：1554775535

data.name: 全局字体背景图
data.description: 几乎全局的字体和背景图修改，把字体加粗,字体换成思源黑体，添加背景图，有一些网站显示不了背景图可能是因为被背景颜色遮住了。另外背景图链接可能会过期，可以自己更改”background-image: url(https://s1.ax1x.com/2020/07/06/UihCfP.png) !important/*背景图片*/“里括号里的链接，“background-size: 100% !important;”更改100为其他数字可以更改图片大小，建议50到100之间

data.name: Island Turnip.exchange clean
data.description: visual simplification to islands on the Turnip.exchange page, so that it can be consulted more easily.

data.name: Watch2gether - Hide Suggestions
data.description: Hides the video suggestions. Note that this will also hide search results! Just disable the style to show them again.

user.name: BabblingFishes
user.about:
[UPDATE: Due to Stylish's frequent server issues, I am in the process of moving my userstyles to GreasyFork. I will not be returning to Stylish until the site issues are fixed.]

I'm a web developer with some visual/attention issues, so I end up coding little styles to get rid of things that make my life harder. Some of them have the side effect of being fun and aesthetically pleasing, too.

I try to make my code easy to read for both people and machines, so you can edit my styles to suit your needs. If you need help with something, or if one of my styles broke, you can ask me about it on my tumblr.

Also note: I don't frequent this site; I only post things here as a place to keep them, so I'll probably end up adding things that have been done before. Sorry about that.

data.name: Myshows ○ Dark
Simple Dark Theme for Flight Rising
data.description: A simple dark theme for Flight Rising, as the default interface is very bright and hard on the eyes. Works across the whole site, even the forums and coliseum. ***NOTICE*** In order to get the usernames to display in the forums as in this theme, please download and install the free font "AR Cena", then restart your browser. You can get it >> HERE << from FontZone.

data.name: a Better Look of Google Drive in Small Window
data.description:
This might not be the best look for Google Drive, but it's definitely great when you have to use Google Drive in a small window.
這也許不是 Google Drive 的最好外觀，但是當你得在一個小視窗中工作時，它肯定不錯。

data.name: Coursera: Enlarge videos on larger screens
data.description: Minimal code to make Coursera work better on larger screens. Simply adjust the couple of CSS styling to your liking if you'd like.

data.name: Embiggen AEM Editor
data.description: Enlarge the AEM editor window to make it more usable and less infuriating.
